relationships.description: Ron seems to have developed an interest in Hermione after seeing her in a new light.
Neville corrects Ron's assumption that Hermione is not a girl, implying they have some kind of relationship or familiarity.
Hermione mentions she is already going with someone, indicating an existing romantic relationship.
